To make Look / Tail / Spine aniamtor implementations work, 
you just need to have them full packages imported inside your project.

If you need implementations for components from other packages
visit this link and download package you need (if implementation exists):
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1mBNkqldl_vbb33XvNCyrW9l4vWpDOfPM?usp=sharing
